mapper.select: select folloingnickName from follow where follower = #{value}
select followernickName from follow where following = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into follow(follower, followernickName, following, folloingnickName) values(#{follower}, #{followernickName}, #{following}, #{folloingnickName})
mapper.delete: delete from follow where follower=#{follower} and following = #{following}
mapper.select: select count(*) from follow where follower=#{follower} and folloingnickName = #{folloingnickName}
